{"id":839581220,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1667930038,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/839581220/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make The String Great","memory":"6.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string makeGood(string s) {\n        int n=s.length();\n        for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++)\n        {\n            if(abs(s[i]-s[i+1])==32)\n            {\n                s=s.substr(0,i)+s.substr(i+2,n-i-2);\n                i=-1;\n                n-=2;\n            }\n        }\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-the-string-great","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
